rows.name: Acidic Burst
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as Corrosive; on crit deals extra acid (x2 1d10, x3 2d10, x4 3d10). Burst works even if Corrosive not activated. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Arcane Might
rows.stacking_rules: Swift action: sacrifice an arcane prepared spell/slot to add its level to the bow's next damage roll this turn.

rows.name: Aquan
rows.stacking_rules: Overcomes DR of fire-subtype creatures; +2d6 damage vs fire subtype. Fire-subtype wielders gain 1 negative level while wielded (can’t be removed while held). Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Aquatic
rows.stacking_rules: No penalties for using the weapon underwater (as freedom of movement for weapon use).

rows.name: Auran
rows.stacking_rules: Overcomes DR of earth-subtype creatures; +2d6 damage vs earth subtype. Earth-subtype wielders gain 1 negative level while wielded (can’t be removed while held). Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Banishing
rows.stacking_rules: Free action on hit vs extraplanar creature (26 HD or fewer): banish (Will DC 20 negates). +2 DC for each alignment/material trait the weapon has that matches the target’s DR requirement. 3/day. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Berserker
rows.stacking_rules: While raging, weapon deals +1d8 damage on each successful attack.

rows.name: Binding
rows.stacking_rules: Swift action: your next successful hit before end of turn applies dimensional anchor for 10 minutes. 2/day. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Blessed
rows.stacking_rules: Counts as good-aligned for DR (continuous). 3/day swift: auto-confirm all crit threats vs evil foes for 1 round (as bless weapon). Doesn’t stack for extra benefit with other crit-confirm/keen/vorpal effects.

rows.name: Blindsighted
rows.stacking_rules: Std action to activate: wielder gains blindsight 30 ft for 1 minute; negated by silence. 3/day.

rows.name: Bloodfeeding
rows.stacking_rules: Each hit on a living creature grants 1 blood point (max 10; store 1 hour). On a hit, free action to spend up to 5 points for +2 damage per point; you don’t gain a point from that same strike.

rows.name: Bloodstone
rows.stacking_rules: As spell storing but only vampiric touch; any stored spell is automatically Empowered. Holds only one spell.
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor; Empower Spell

rows.name: Blurstrike
rows.stacking_rules: Swift: for 1 round, target is treated as flat-footed against your first attack with this weapon. No effect vs blindsight users or uncanny dodge. 10/day.

rows.name: Brash
rows.stacking_rules: If you rage while wielding: rage lasts +3 rounds; while raging you are immune to fear.

rows.name: Brutal Surge
rows.stacking_rules: After a successful melee hit, swift action to bull rush target using your stats; if two-handed, +2 on opposed Str check. You don’t move with target; movement provokes AoOs from others only. Uses/day = 1 + your Con bonus; once used, no other creature can use it until next day.

rows.name: Bodyfeeder
rows.stacking_rules: On a crit vs living target, gain temp HP equal to half the crit’s damage; lasts up to 1 minute; doesn’t stack with itself or other sources.
rows.required_spells: vampiric touch or claws of the vampire (EPH 84)
